com.splunk
Class InputCollection

java.lang.Object
  com.splunk.Resource
      com.splunk.ResourceCollection<T>
          com.splunk.EntityCollection<Input>
              com.splunk.InputCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Input>
public class InputCollection
extends EntityCollection<Input>

Representation of the Collection of Inputs. The collection is heterogeneous and contains a kind-property that indicates the specific kind of input.
